item.title: Transatlantic Research Partnership - Casimir Study
item.description: Set up preliminary experiemnts to study the Casimir effect on buoyant marine debris in surface wave turbulence.

item.title: Young Coastal Scientist and Engineers Conference - Americas (YCSEC-A)
item.description: The University of Wisconsin - Madison hosted the 9th Young Coastal Scientists and Engineers Conference â€“ Americas (YCSEC-A). Ben served on the student organization committee, helping to faciliate a smooth conference experience for the attendees.

item.title: Wisconsin Sea Grant 'Ask a Scientist'
item.description: Presented a virtual lesson to high school students at Rhinelander High School about microplastics in the Great Lakes.

item.title: UW - Madison Day at the Capitol
item.description: Presented work regarding microplastic pollution and issues to legislators and staff at the Wisconsin state capitol.
